dumpObj.title: Instance of class 'class' as defined in module 'MixerDevice'
dumpObj.documentation: This class represents a Mixer Device in Live, which gives you access to the Volume and Panning properties of a Track.

attribute.name: canonical_parent
attribute.type: Get the canonical parent of the mixer device.

attribute.name: crossfade_assign
attribute.type: Player- and ReturnTracks only: Const access to the Track's Crossfade Assign State.

attribute.name: crossfader
attribute.type: MasterTrack only: Const access to the Crossfader.

attribute.name: cue_volume
attribute.type: MasterTrack only: Const access to the Cue Volume Parameter.

attribute.name: panning
attribute.type: Const access to the Tracks Panning Device Parameter.

attribute.name: sends
attribute.type: Const access to the Tracks list of Send Amount Device Parameters.

attribute.name: volume
attribute.type: Const access to the Tracks Volume Device Parameter.
